location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government, dated 11 December 1810, which informed William Bruce of the appointment of Lieutenant Livingston (post unspecified) and ordered him to provide any necessary aid requested by him.
